allTabsLabel.description: Label shown at the bottom of the list of tabs if some tabs are filtered by a query.

browserActionTitle.description: Tooltip shown when hovering the toolbar button.

closeTabButtonTooltip.description: Taken from Firefox: https://pontoon.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/all-resources/?string=197248. Tooltip of the close button on tabs.

contextMenuCloseOtherTabs.description: Taken from Firefox: https://pontoon.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/all-resources/?string=197270. Context menu item label.

contextMenuCloseTab.description: Taken from Firefox: https://pontoon.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/all-resources/?string=197248. Context menu item label.

contextMenuCloseTabs.description: Taken from Firefox: https://pontoon.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/all-resources/?string=197250. Context Menu item label

contextMenuMoveTab.description: Taken from Firefox: https://pontoon.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/all-resources/?string=197269. Context menu item label.

contextMenuMoveTabToNewWindow.description: Taken from Firefox: https://pontoon.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/all-resources/?string=197261. Context menu item label.

contextMenuNoContainer.description: Taken from Firefox: https://pontoon.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/all-resources/?string=153932 and https://pontoon.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/all-resources/?string=153933. Context menu item label.

contextMenuOpenInContextualTab.description: Taken from Firefox: https://pontoon.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/all-resources/?string=197234. Context menu item label.

contextMenuPinTab.description: Taken from Firefox: https://pontoon.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/all-resources/?string=197249. Context menu item label.

contextMenuReloadTab.description: Taken from Firefox: https://pontoon.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/all-resources/?string=197237. Context menu item label.

contextMenuUndoCloseTab.description: Taken from Firefox: https://pontoon.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/all-resources/?string=197236. Context menu item label.

contextMenuUnmuteTab.description: Taken from Firefox: https://pontoon.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/all-resources/?string=99190. Context menu item label and tooltip of the unmute icon on tabs.

contextMenuUnpinTab.description: Taken from Firefox: https://pontoon.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/all-resources/?string=197266. Context menu item label.

extensionDescription.description: Extension description shown in the options page and as short description on addons.mozilla.org.
extensionDescription.message: Simple and powerful vertical tab bar

extensionsLongDescription.description: Long description displayed on addons.mozilla.org. Don’t forget to change links for the current language. You can copy translated permissions from your language version of https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/permission-request-messages-firefox-extensions.

muteTabButtonTooltip.description: Taken from Firefox: https://pontoon.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/all-resources/?string=99188. Tooltip of the audible icon on tabs, displayed on the favicon.

newTabBtnTooltip.description: Taken from Firefox: https://pontoon.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/all-resources/?string=74421. Tooltip of the New Tab button in the top menu.

newTabContextMenuOpenInPrivateWindow.description: Taken from Firefox: https://pontoon.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/all-resources/?string=75628. New Tab context menu item.

newTabContextMenuOpenInWindow.description: Take from Firefox: https://pontoon.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/all-resources/?string=75625. New Tab context menu item.

notificationDeletedMessage.description: Title of the notification when deleting many tabs.
notificationDeletedMessage.message: Click on the notification to undo.

notificationDeletedTitle.description: Title of the notification when deleting many tabs.

optionsAdvancedTitle.description: Taken from Firefox: https://pontoon.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/all-resources/?string=176300. Section in options page.

optionsCompactModeDynamic.description: Possible value for Compact Mode option in options page.

optionsCompactModeExplanation.description: Explanation for the Compact Mode option in options page.
optionsCompactModeExplanation.message: The Compact Mode reduces the height of tabs to show more of them. In the Dynamic setting, it will engage once we have no space left.

optionsCompactModeOff.description: Possible value for Compact Mode option in options page.

optionsCompactModeStrict.description: Possible value for Compact Mode option in options page.

optionsCustomCSSChangelogLink.description: Text for a link to the changelog.
optionsCustomCSSChangelogLink.message: Check the changelog for breaking changes

optionsCustomCSSWikiLink.description: Text for a link to the wiki.

optionsNotifyClosingManyTabsExplanation.description: Explanation for the Notify when closing many tabs option in options page.
optionsNotifyClosingManyTabsExplanation.message: Display a notification to let you undo when closing more than $COUNT$ tabs.

optionsSwitchByScrollingWithCtrlExplanat.description: Explanation for the Switch by scrolling options in options page.
optionsSwitchByScrollingWithCtrlExplanat.message: Activate the next or previous tab instead of scrolling under certain circumstances.

optionsSwitchLastActiveTabExplanation.description: Explanation for the Compact Mode option in options page.
optionsSwitchLastActiveTabExplanation.message: Click active tab to switch to the last active one.

optionsThemeIntegrationExplanation.description: Explanation for the Theme Integration option in the options page.
optionsThemeIntegrationExplanation.message: Use current browser theme instead of default light theme.

searchPlaceholder.description: Placehorder of the filter bar in the top menu.

settingsBtnTooltip.description: Tooltip of the settings button in the top menu.

unmuteTabButtonTooltip.description: Taken from Firefox: https://pontoon.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/all-resources/?string=99190. Tooltip of the unmute icon on tabs, displayed on the favicon.
